tiles.title: Slack
tiles.text: The People of Color Code Slack is an online place for you to connect and share resources with other people.

tiles.title: Meetup
tiles.text: Join us in person for Code and Chill events, workshops, and other technical presentations.

tiles.title: Speaker Opportunities
tiles.text: Interested in providing a workshop or giving a talk? Apply to speak at one of our events.
